title: Uruk Stormer (4C198)
text:
Set:	The Two Towers
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Isengard
Twilight:	3
Card Type:	Minion • Uruk-Hai
Strength:	8
Vitality:	2
Site:	5
Game Text:	Damage +1. Each time a companion or ally is killed during a skirmish involving an Uruk-hai, you may take control of a site.
Lore:	“They wavered, broke, and fled back; and then charged again, broke and charged again; and each time, like the incoming sea, they halted at a higher point.”
Rarity:	C
